Polyphen prediction pipeline¶

Author:Andreas Heger
Release:$Id: pipeline_snps.py 2870 2010-03-03 10:20:29Z andreas $
Date:April 02, 2014
Tags:Python

Purpose¶

Input:

Indels in pileup format.

Usage¶

Type:

python <script_name>.py --help

for command line help.

Code¶

pipeline_polyphen.buildGeneRegions(infile, outfile)¶

annotate genomic regions with reference gene set.

Only considers protein coding genes. In case of overlapping genes, only take the longest (in genomic coordinates). Genes not on UCSC contigs are removed.

pipeline_polyphen.buildGenes(infile, outfile)¶

build a collection of exons from the protein-coding section of the ENSEMBL gene set. The exons include both CDS and UTR.

The set is filtered in the same way as in buildGeneRegions().

pipeline_polyphen.loadGeneInformation(infile, outfile)¶

load the transcript set.

pipeline_polyphen.loadGeneStats(infile, outfile)¶

load the transcript set.

pipeline_polyphen.buildTranscripts(infile, outfile)¶

build a collection of transcripts from the protein-coding section of the ENSEMBL gene set.

Only CDS are used.

pipeline_polyphen.loadTranscripts(infile, outfile)¶

load the transcript set.

pipeline_polyphen.loadTranscriptStats(infile, outfile)¶

load the transcript set.

pipeline_polyphen.loadTranscriptInformation(infile, outfile)¶

load the transcript set.

pipeline_polyphen.buildPeptideFasta(infile, outfile)¶

load ENSEMBL peptide file

infile is an ENSEMBL .pep.all.fa.gz file.

pipeline_polyphen.buildCDNAFasta(infile, outfile)¶

load ENSEMBL peptide file

infile is an ENSEMBL .cdna.all.fa.gz file.

pipeline_polyphen.buildCDSFasta(infile, outfile)¶

build cds sequences from peptide and cds file.

infile is an ENSEMBL .cdna.all.fa.gz file.

pipeline_polyphen.loadProteinStats(infile, outfile)¶

load the transcript set.

pipeline_polyphen.buildBenchmarkSet(infile, outfile)¶

build a benchmark set of protein ids.

pipeline_polyphen.buildPolyphenFeatures(infile, outfile)¶

run polyphen on the cluster.

To do this, first send uniref to all nodes:

python ~/cgat/cluster_distribute.py
–collection=andreas /net/cpp-group/tools/polyphen-2.0.18/nrdb/uniref100*.{pin,psd,psi,phr,psq,pal}
pipeline_polyphen.runPolyphen(infile, outfile, model)¶

run POLYPHEN on feature tables to classify SNPs.

pipeline_polyphen.loadPolyphenWeights(infile, outfile)¶

load polyphen input data.

pipeline_polyphen.loadPolyphen(infile, outfile)¶

load polyphen results.

The comment column is ignored.
